description.@en: Purple, Ætheric energy engulfs the scythe you hold, ready for the reaping.

criticalFailure.@en: The scythe takes on its own personality, dancing into the air as if guided by an apparition, for the spell’s Duration. For the Duration of the spell, roll [[/roll 1D6]] Chaos Die at the start of your Turn. If the result is face ‘1’, it will lash out at you; if the result is face ‘2-5’, the scythe does nothing; and if the result is face ‘6’, it will lash out at a random ally.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but victims cannot Dodge or Parry this attack.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the scythe is engulfed in purple, deadly energy. The scythe is a two-handed melee weapon with the Powerful Quality. Instead of using your [CB], refer to your [WB] to determine Damage. Finally, whenever you strike or Parry with this scythe, refer to your Odweft Skill instead of a Combat-based Skill. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but they Bleed instead.

reagents.@en: A farmer’s scythe, held in both hands
